com.grademaster.data
Class DataInterface

java.lang.Object
  com.grademaster.data.DataInterface
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDataInterface, java.io.Flushable
Direct Known Subclasses:
XMLInterface
public abstract class DataInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDataInterface

DataInterface provides the cache handling and misc. functions of a data interface that would be the same across all IDataInterfaces Author: Jake Billings Date created: 12-13-2012 Desc: A very basic implementation of IDataInterface that leaves most of the code to subclasses.

Author:
jake

Field Summary
 IDataAdapter adapter
          The IDataAdapter that converts data from its raw data format to a com.grademaster.data.object
(package private)  IDataObject cache
          Stores the cached objects if caching is enabled
 boolean cached
          True=cached DataInterface; False=non-cached DataInterface Caching uses slightly more memory, but improves performance.
protected  boolean cacheLoaded
          For internal use, tells whether or not a cache has been loaded at all
 IRawLoader loader
          The IRawLoader that loads raw data for the DataInterface as a String.

Field Detail

loader

public IRawLoader loader
The IRawLoader that loads raw data for the DataInterface as a String. See IRawLoader and RawLocalLoader

adapter

public IDataAdapter adapter
The IDataAdapter that converts data from its raw data format to a com.grademaster.data.object

cached

public boolean cached
True=cached DataInterface; False=non-cached DataInterface Caching uses slightly more memory, but improves performance. It may lead to confusing IO errors. No cachcing increases ease of coding and decreases memory usage, but leads to more IO total.

cacheLoaded

protected boolean cacheLoaded
For internal use, tells whether or not a cache has been loaded at all

cache

IDataObject cache
Stores the cached objects if caching is enabled
